boss.name: Lazrothe the Sorceror
boss.attack: Spells (Fog: Obscures vision and hinders initiative) (Ice Touch: From range can cause loss of footing and focus; at melee, deals 1d8 damage) (Summon: Summons once per battle 1d4 Skeletons)
boss.description: Once a highly prized magic-user of the world, now a bitter man who's ambition jeopardized the realm. Deeper delves into the arcane workings of evil magics put the realm at risk, and he was removed from his station. Now hides in remote lairs, building an army for revenge.

boss.name: Martin de Flail, Captain
boss.attack: Always has initiative unless fully surprised or tricked. Accompanied by: 2 Soldiers: HD(2)|AC/ATK (12)|Dmg(d6)
boss.description: A proud warrior who felt slighted when a promotion was not rewarded to him. Has taken to terroizing the countryside and attacking patrols of soliders. Not really a Captain, but this has become part of his myth.

boss.name: Grilsa, the Great Brood Mother
boss.stats: HD(4)|AC/ATK(14)|Dmg(d6 sting + d6 bite). Impossible to surprise with initiative. Weak against fire and cold. Each new round of combat, adds one Spider to the fight.
boss.description: Said to be ancient and wise, but also cruel and bloodthirsty. Sole motive is to continue aging and growing her brood. It is said her eyes are rare fiery-red jewels worth 100 gold each.

boss.name: Firebane, the Eater of Dragons
boss.stats: HD(7)|AC/ATK(17)|Dmg(d6 flame + d6 bite + d6 claw). Weak against his own reflection. Removing a foot claw will deal 3d8 damage to him. Uses his wings and flame breath to keep enemies at a distance from his vulnerable foot.
boss.description: Terrorizes the inner mountain ranges, though sometimes ventures out into the valleys in pursuit of large dragon prey. Is said to sit over the great hoard of a lost civilation. If exposed to live fire, the removed claw will transform into a small dragon egg.

boss.name: The Shrieking Wight:
boss.stats: HD(4)|AC/ATK(14)|Dmg(d6 sword + d4 dagger) Weak against fire, light, and healing magic. Cannot be poisoned.
boss.description: A product of dark magic unchecked, this Wight has risen to lead fellow undead against humanity.

boss.name: Sorlak, the Lich:
boss.stats: HD(8)|AC/ATK(18)|Spells (Bolt Arrow deals 1d4 damage) (Lightning deals 1d10 damage) (Life Drain deals 1 damage a turn, and gives Lich 1 life per turn). Immune to cold, lightning, and poison. Reduces ranged damage by d4. Weak against piercing.
boss.description: A fierce undead wizard fully corrupted by the practice of dark magic. Consumes souls for power. Unleashes the undead amongst the world. Controls many minions and spies. Seeks powerful artifacts to augment its power.
